I've never understood this mindset. Just bc you grew up near campus doesn't mean you want to attend there. Many kids also don't want to follow in their parent's footsteps. They want to venture out and make their own way. I don't see it as inexcusable. It happens often in CFB. 🤷‍♂️ https://t.co/zBdAGAFCFi

@Paul44926402 Freddie didn't sign. Braves offered a more than fair contract. He chose to walk. Or possibly his agent (that he hired) chose for him. Freeman would be in Atlanta if he wanted to be. Riley clearly wanted to stay as he could have possibly made more by holding out. He didn't.
I'm definitely good with this move 😎 #ForTheA https://t.co/xf63Ne8srS

Arizona’s second-round selection of Ivan Melendez has officially extended the MLB Draft streak belonging to @TexasBaseball. The Longhorns have had at least one player taken in every draft since the very first one in 1965. That is a 57-year run. #HookEm
